hero.title: About Cloud Rescue Foundation
hero.subtitle: Connecting hearts across borders, one rescue dog at a time

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To revolutionize animal welfare by creating a transparent, sustainable bridge between compassionate people worldwide and rescue dogs in China through innovative cloud sponsorship technology.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Cloud Rescue Foundation was born from a simple observation: countless people want to help rescue dogs but face barriers like distance, long-term commitment requirements, and lack of transparency. Meanwhile, rescue shelters in China struggle with chronic funding shortages and lack of international connections.
story.paragraph2: We recognized that technology could bridge these gaps. By creating a platform that enables "cloud sponsorship," we allow people worldwide to make meaningful weekly contributions to dogs they care about, while maintaining complete transparency through video updates and direct communication with shelter managers.
story.paragraph3: Today, we're proud to connect thousands of sponsors with verified shelters across China, providing sustainable support for dogs who need it most while empowering shelters to grow responsibly.
story.paragraph4: The founder personally cares for four dogsâ€”three rescued from the streets or sheltersâ€”and has volunteered for years at a homeless shelter. After witnessing the shelter's funding gaps, they donated personal funds and then invested their own time and money to build Cloud Rescue Foundation.

luna.title: Luna's Journey
luna.description: Luna was rescued from the streets of Beijing in critical condition. Through Cloud Rescue, she found 15 cloud sponsors who supported her recovery. Today, Luna is healthy, happy, and has been physically adopted by a loving family in Shanghai.

max.title: Max's Second Chance
max.description: Max, a senior dog abandoned by his owners, found support through 8 dedicated cloud sponsors. Their weekly contributions ensure Max receives the medical care and comfort he deserves in his golden years.

buddy.title: Buddy's New Beginning
buddy.description: Buddy was found injured on a highway, scared and alone. Through Cloud Rescue, 12 compassionate sponsors provided the funds for his surgery and rehabilitation. After 6 months of care, Buddy found his forever home with a family in Shenzhen who fell in love with his gentle spirit.

bella.title: Bella's Family
bella.description: Bella arrived at the shelter pregnant and malnourished. Thanks to 20 cloud sponsors, she received proper nutrition and veterinary care. She safely delivered 5 healthy puppies, all of whom have now been sponsored. Bella continues to thrive at the shelter, bringing joy to everyone she meets.

charlie.title: Charlie's Transformation
charlie.description: Charlie was extremely shy and fearful when he first arrived, having been abused by previous owners. With patience, love, and support from 10 cloud sponsors over 8 months, Charlie slowly learned to trust again. He's now living happily with an experienced dog trainer who continues his rehabilitation journey.

download.title: Download Cloud Rescue for Android
download.subtitle: Get the app directly for Android devices

step1.title: Download the APK
step1.description: Click the download button above to download the Cloud Rescue APK file to your Android device.

step2.title: Enable Unknown Sources
step2.description: Before installing, you need to allow installation from unknown sources. Go to Settings > Security > Enable 'Install unknown apps' or 'Unknown sources'.

step3.title: Trust the APK
step3.description: When you open the downloaded APK file, your device may show a security warning. Tap 'Install' or 'Allow' to proceed. This is safe - the app is verified by Cloud Rescue Foundation.

step4.title: Complete Installation
step4.description: Follow the on-screen prompts to complete the installation. Once installed, open the app and start sponsoring rescue dogs!

importantNotes.title: Important Notes
importantNotes.note1: This APK is only for Android devices. iOS users should download from the App Store.
importantNotes.note2: You may need to allow installation from 'Unknown Sources' in your device settings.
importantNotes.note3: The first time you install, your device may warn you about installing from an unknown source. This is normal - tap 'Install anyway' or 'Allow'.
importantNotes.note4: If you encounter any issues, please contact us at admin@cloudrescuefoundation.org

securityInfo.title: Is it Safe?
securityInfo.description: Yes! This APK is the official Cloud Rescue app. We are a verified nonprofit organization. The app is safe to install and use.
